text: Edgar Laverne Olson (October 19, 1937 - August 20, 2020) was an American politician. He was in the Minnesota House of Representatives between 1985 to 1998. He was born in Fosston, Minnesota. He was a member of the Minnesota Democratic–Farmer–Labor Party. Olson died on August 20, 2020 at a hospital in Madison, Minnesota at the age of 82.Edgar Olson-obituary ==References== Category:1937 births Category:2020 deaths Category:State legislators of the United States Category:Politicians from Minnesota Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Edgar Olson
